message.content:
cs.CL, cs.HC, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI 

This paper is about building machine translation evaluation sets using Amazon's Mechanical Turk. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also involves human-computer interaction (HCI) through the use of Mechanical Turk, making cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) another likely category. The paper also involves information retrieval (IR) in the sense that it evaluates the performance of MT systems, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible category. The paper also involves machine learning (ML) in the sense that it evaluates the performance of multiple MT systems, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a possible category. Finally, the paper involves artificial intelligence (AI) in the sense that it deals with MT, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a possible category.
